name: Clurududu
description:
Controll: Arrows or WASD.

The light can't touch the colorful dots, pass over a big rect to turn off the correspondent color. Go to the white rect to go to the next map.

I made this game in two days to the Summer Game Jam (my first jam). If you wanna see my next game or say something, follow me on twitter @EdoardoLopes. Hope you like it. :D
